chunks.zh: 看到有人问游戏，正好说下自己心中玩的网游排名
chunks.en: Seeing someone ask about games, I'll just share my personal ranking of online games I've played.

chunks.zh:
https://i.imgur.com/jrFoDPf.png


1 、先说背景
chunks.en:
https://i.imgur.com/jrFoDPf.png


1. Let's talk about the background first.

chunks.zh: 从小到大最爱玩游戏了，大部分时间都是网游，所以在这里说下我心中的网游排名。
chunks.en: I've loved playing games since I was a kid, and most of the time it's been online games, so I'll share my personal ranking of online games here.

chunks.zh: 《冒险岛》，现在是一款垃圾游戏，但是在我心中永远是第一位，从小学五年玩到毕业，玩到工作
chunks.en: 《MapleStory》, it's a terrible game now, but it's always number one in my heart. I played it from fifth grade until graduation and even into work.

chunks.zh: 玩的最久的应该是《英雄联盟》，怀念和大学同学一起开黑的日子
chunks.en: I probably played 《League of Legends》 the longest. I miss the days of playing with my college classmates.

chunks.zh: 怀念《 dnf 》 80 版本之前，和发小一起玩的时光。
chunks.en: I miss the time before the 80 version of 《DNF》, playing with my childhood friends.

chunks.zh: 已经一年多没玩游戏了，现在感觉玩游戏就像上班一样。。
chunks.en: I haven't played games for over a year now. Now, playing games feels like going to work...

chunks.zh: 2 、顺便介绍下这个排名工具，欢迎使用
chunks.en: 2. By the way, let me introduce this ranking tool. Welcome to use it.

chunks.zh:
右下角水印就是地址
http://simple-maker.fun
chunks.en:
The address is in the watermark in the lower right corner.
http://simple-maker.fun

chunks.zh: 我的印象最深的居然是，穿越火线。
chunks.en: The game that impressed me the most was actually CrossFire.

chunks.zh: WOW 魔兽世界 yyds
chunks.en: WOW World of Warcraft yyds (forever number one)

chunks.zh: 为碟醋包的饺子，https://tiermaker.com/
chunks.en: Dumplings wrapped in saucer vinegar, https://tiermaker.com/

chunks.zh: 我个人理解，网游的评价维度，和单机游戏完全不同。
chunks.en: In my personal understanding, the evaluation dimensions of online games are completely different from those of single-player games.

chunks.zh: 网游的游戏模式，严格受到网络硬件环境，以及大众配置的直接影响。
chunks.en: The game mode of online games is strictly influenced by the network hardware environment and the direct impact of public configuration.

chunks.zh: 所以网游往往充满各种时代的妥协。
chunks.en: Therefore, online games are often full of compromises of various eras.

chunks.zh: 网游的评价也只能按照当时的时间点来横向比较。
chunks.en: The evaluation of online games can only be compared horizontally based on the time point at that time.

chunks.zh: 比如石器时代和魔力宝贝，虽然有重叠的运营时间，但无论从机制设计、还是开发人员流转的角度上讲，是完全两个世代的游戏。
chunks.en: For example, Stone Age and Magic Baby, although there is overlapping operating time, are completely two generations of games, whether from the perspective of mechanism design or developer turnover.

chunks.zh: 所以虽然魔力宝贝的游戏素质本身全维度碾压石器，但在我的理解中，石器时代是优于魔力宝贝的。
chunks.en: So although Magic Baby's game quality itself crushes Stone Age in all dimensions, in my understanding, Stone Age is better than Magic Baby.

chunks.zh: 同理，开创“无”锁定模式的 MMO 剑灵，虽然他的同屏怪物数量、同步率被魔兽吊打，但也是很伟大的游戏。
chunks.en: Similarly, Blade & Soul, the MMO that pioneered the 'no' lock mode, although its number of monsters on the same screen and synchronization rate are crushed by World of Warcraft, is also a great game.

chunks.zh: 都是“扎堆站桩”，EVE 的完全自由市场、战舰更多的属性维度，就比热血传奇的屠龙刀秒杀一切，要强很多。
chunks.en: Both are 'mass stand-up', EVE's completely free market and more attribute dimensions of battleships are much stronger than the Killing Dragon Blade of Hot-Blooded Legend, which instantly kills everything.

chunks.zh: 居然有冒险岛！老岛民前来点赞！
chunks.en: There's actually MapleStory! An old islander comes to give a like!

chunks.zh: 不过我现在还在玩，让我排名，我也排第一😎
chunks.en: But I'm still playing it now. If I were to rank it, I would also rank it first. 😎

chunks.zh: 龙之谷
chunks.en: Dragon Nest

chunks.zh: 老年人游戏 炉石 雀魂
chunks.en: Old people's games: Hearthstone, Mahjong Soul

chunks.zh: 冒险岛，洛奇
chunks.en: MapleStory, Mabinogi

chunks.zh: 1 、冒险岛 小时候 4 年级就被我哥拉到电脑包宿，人还没电脑高呢。
chunks.en: 1. MapleStory: When I was in 4th grade, my brother dragged me to a computer cafe for the night. I wasn't even as tall as the computer.

chunks.zh: 2 、魔兽世界 至今还在玩。
chunks.en: 2. World of Warcraft: I'm still playing it.

chunks.zh: 3 、命运方舟 刚开服，玩到了女 BOSS 那里，老牛下一个。
chunks.en: 3. Lost Ark: I just started playing it and got to the female BOSS, the old bull is next.

chunks.zh: 忘记叫啥了，游戏不错被策划毁了
chunks.en: I forgot what it's called. It's a good game ruined by the planners.

chunks.zh: 4 、LOL 偶尔和朋友打一把，好累玩得
chunks.en: 4. LOL: Occasionally play a round with friends. It's so tiring to play.

chunks.zh: 5 、DNF 一年上去领一套天空，小时候没钱，眼馋的不行。
chunks.en: 5. DNF: Go up once a year to claim a set of Sky costumes. I didn't have money when I was a kid, and I was extremely envious.

chunks.zh: 然后卸载
chunks.en: Then uninstall.

chunks.zh: 6 、疯狂赛车，个人认为比跑跑好玩，哈哈
chunks.en: 6. Crazy Racing: I personally think it's more fun than Kart Rider, haha.

chunks.zh: 7 、魔域 凑钱买的大飞
chunks.en: 7. Conquer Online: I saved up to buy a Da Fei (expensive in-game item).

chunks.zh: 8 、CF 通宵日日夜夜玩，最开心的时候是上半夜刷疲劳，中间打枪，下半夜看 xxx
chunks.en: 8. CF: Playing day and night all night. The happiest time was when I was farming fatigue in the first half of the night, playing shooting games in the middle, and watching xxx in the second half of the night.

chunks.zh: 9 、剑三？大学和同学玩过一段时间，评价是不如 wow
chunks.en: 9. Jian Wang 3? I played it with classmates for a while in college. My evaluation is that it's not as good as WoW.

chunks.zh: 10 、ff14 ？ 开服玩了一下，很新颖。
chunks.en: 10. FF14? I played it for a while when it was released. It was very novel.

chunks.zh: 但是画风不喜欢
chunks.en: But I don't like the art style.

chunks.zh: 11 、剑灵 好玩的呢！
chunks.en: 11. Blade & Soul: It's fun!

chunks.zh: 这辈子忘不了曾经登录彩虹岛看到那个缤纷多彩新世界的快乐
chunks.en: I will never forget the joy of logging into Rainbow Island and seeing that colorful new world.

chunks.zh: 网游感觉纯靠记忆加成诶，我心中的网游白月光是：- 快乐西游（类冒险岛，通过这个认识了我老婆）- 魔灵（小学和发小一起在网吧的时光）。- CSGO （其实应该是 CS 1.5 or 1.6 算起）
chunks.en: Online games feel purely memory-enhanced. My favorite online games are: - Happy Journey to the West (similar to MapleStory, I met my wife through this) - Magic Spirits (time spent in internet cafes with childhood friends in elementary school). - CSGO (actually, it should be counted from CS 1.5 or 1.6)

chunks.zh: @BeforeTooLate 当初卡箱子， 双人飞天跳，。。。。。以前的生化好玩啊
chunks.en: @BeforeTooLate Back then, we used to exploit the boxes, double flying jump... The old zombie mode was fun.

chunks.zh: 其实我想说魔兽世界的，但是现在确实变成了一坨屎
chunks.en: Actually, I wanted to say World of Warcraft, but now it has indeed become a pile of crap.

chunks.zh: 投冒险岛一票
chunks.en: Casting a vote for MapleStory

chunks.zh: 传奇私服
chunks.en: Private server of Legend of Mir

chunks.zh: 手残党，经济类的都玩不明白我觉得魔兽世界第一，场景宏大，但入手也极其困难
chunks.en: As someone with clumsy hands who doesn't understand economic types of games, I think World of Warcraft is number one. The scene is grand, but it's extremely difficult to get into.

chunks.zh: @HtPM @gimp 英雄岛我也玩过。。 飞行岛，冲锋岛，冒险岛，。。。 感觉岛字的都玩过
chunks.en: @HtPM @gimp I also played Hero Island... Flying Island, Charging Island, Adventure Island... I feel like I've played all the games with 'Island' in the name.

chunks.en: Bandori! Garupa Pico!

chunks.en: dota2

chunks.en: My ranking: wow, Legend of Mir, Fantasy Star Online
